<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Drow Fighter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=165)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Drow fighters train to master techniques that inflict deep, bleeding wounds and use poisoned crossbow bolts to exhaust enemies.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Drow_DrowFighter.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Drow Fighter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=165)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Drow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=51" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 136</row>

**Perception** +6; darkvision

**Languages**
[Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +3, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)**

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (2 doses)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +4 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic, +2 status to all saves vs. mental
</row>

**HP** 18

**Immunities**
sleep

**Attack of Opportunity** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rapier +9 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
main-gauche +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +9 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus [_lethargy poison_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 14
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) (at will)

**Quick Draw** <actions string="Single Action" />  The drow fighter draws a weapon using the Interact action, then Strikes with that weapon.

**Skewer** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The drow fighter Strikes with its rapier, and gains a +1 circumstance bonus to the attack roll. A creature damaged by the attack takes 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-37" />
name: Drow Fighter
